data.eml:eml: The genus Omphreus in Bosnia and Herzegovina and Montenegro, with two new subspecies of O. morio (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Omphreini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Curcic, Srecko, Sciaky, Riccardo, Antic, Dragan, Vesovic, Nikola (2015): The genus Omphreus in Bosnia and Herzegovina and Montenegro, with two new subspecies of O. morio (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Omphreini). ZooKeys 509: 123-139, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.509.9506, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.509.9506
